news.title: Election Results
news.summary: <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> 2015 election results are available.

news.title: Companion Volume: Progress Report
news.summary: Philip Cantino reports on the progress of Phylonyms, the companion volume to the PhyloCode.

news.title: PhyloCode 5.0 Beta Version
news.summary: A new version of the PhyloCode will be posted once the Preface and Index have been completed. A beta version is available on request.

news.title: Companion Volume: Progress Report
news.summary: Philip Cantino reports on the progress of Phylonyms, the companion volume to the PhyloCode. The manuscript is scheduled to be submitted to the publisher by 1 September 2014.

news.title: Election Results
news.summary: <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> 2014 election results are available.

news.title: Companion Volume: Progress Report
news.summary: Philip Cantino reports on the progress of the PhyloCode Companion Volume.

news.title: Species Amendment Proposed
news.summary: A proposal to amend the PhyloCode with respect to species has been posted.

news.title: Companion Volume: Progress Report
news.summary: Kevin de Queiroz reports on the progress of the PhyloCode Companion Volume.

news.title: PhyloCode Version 4c
news.summary: Version 4c of the draft PhyloCode has been posted online.

news.title: Third Meeting
news.summary: The third meeting of the <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> was held at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, 20–22 July 2008.

news.title: Second Meeting
news.summary: The second meeting of the <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> was held at Yale University in New Haven, Connecticut, 28 June–2 July 2006.

news.title: First Meeting
news.summary: The first meeting of the <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> was held at Mus√©um National d'Histoire Naturelle in Paris, France 6–9 July 2004.
